subject: AI & Agents
title: Intersectional Bias
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Intersectional Bias.

hook.text: The model is fair for women. Fair for Black users. But not for Black women.

buildup.text: Intersectional bias occurs at the intersection of multiple identity dimensions.

discovery.text: Testing one axis at a time misses compounding effects that only appear together.

twist.text: Smaller subgroups have less data, making bias harder to detect and easier to ignore.

climax.text: Disaggregate metrics by combinations of attributes, not just individual ones.

punchline.text: Fairness isn't additive. Test the intersections.

quiz.question: What is intersectional bias?
options: Bias at the intersection of multiple identity dimensions
Bias caused by too much data
